headline: Kenvue (NYSE:KVUE) Enhances Board With New Directors Amid Starboard Value Agreement
summary: Kenvue (NYSE:KVUE) saw an 8.5% share price increase over the last month, likely influenced by significant board changes and agreement with activist investor Starboard Value. The addition of board members Sarah Hofstetter, Erica Mann, and Jeffrey C. Smith could enhance governance and strategic direction, appealing to shareholders concerned with stewardship and growth potential. While Kenvue's earnings results reflected stable sales and a slight decline in net income, the broader market faced...
